name: Team Kaiju - WaterBot
description:
Welcome Water Bot! You have been tasked with the crucial mission of replenishing the villages water reservoir. Collect water canisters and use the enormous water pumps to add to your score. Use your hydro jetpack to get to hard to reach places; however, be careful as it consumes some of your water.

Made for the Ukie Games Jam

References:

Freesound - "relaxation music #36.mp3" by ShortRecord   Music Used – all rights belong to original creator.
